## Messenger.addMessageListener() method

Add a listener to messages received by the other context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addMessageListener(listener: MessageListener): ListenerRemover;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listener | MessageListener | A listener that will receive the MessageEvent |

<b>Returns:</b>

ListenerRemover

A function that can be invoked to remove the listener
